name: Greybird Theme for Glowing Bear
description: A theme to integrate Glowing Bear with Xubuntu's default theme, Greybird. This looks best when used as an application window (created with Chrome or Firefox).  It styles the topbar, sidebar, and dialogs to look more like a native application.
